original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Atha kho kassapo devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ jetavanaṁ
analyzed: atha kho kassapaḥ deva puttaḥ abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkanta vaṇṇaḥ kevala kappam jetavana

original: obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ
analyzed: obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamanta

original: aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho kassapo devaputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: aṭṭhāsi ekamantam ṭhitaḥ kho kassapaḥ deva puttaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “bhikkhuṁ bhagavā pakāsesi, no ca bhikkhuno anusāsan”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhum bhagavā pakāsesi no ca bhikkhunaḥ anusāsanti
tena hi kassapa tat na eva ittha paṭibhātu uti

original: Atha kho kassapo devaputto “samanuñño me satthā”ti bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyīti.
analyzed: atha kho kassapaḥ deva putto samanuññaḥ me satthā ati bhagavantam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā tattha iva antaradhāyi iti

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho kassapo devaputto bhagavato santike imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
analyzed: ekamantam ṭhitaḥ kho kassapaḥ deva puttaḥ bhagavato santike imam gātham abhāsi

original: Atha kho māgho devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ jetavanaṁ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: atha kho māghaḥ deva puttaḥ abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkanta vaṇṇaḥ kevala kappam jetavanam obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam aṭṭhāsi

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho māgho devaputto bhagavantaṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
analyzed: ekamantam ṭhitaḥ kho māghaḥ devaputtaḥ bhagavantam gāthāya ajjhabhāsi
tat hi chetvā na socati iti

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho māgadho devaputto bhagavantaṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
analyzed: ekamantam ṭhitaḥ kho māgadhaḥ deva puttaḥ bhagavantam gāthāya ajjhabhāsi

original: Atha kho dāmali devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ jetavanaṁ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: atha kho dāmali deva puttaḥ abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkanta vaṇṇaḥ kevala kappam jetavanam obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam aṭṭhāsi

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho dāmali devaputto bhagavato santike imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
analyzed: ekamantam ṭhitaḥ kho dāmali devaputtaḥ bhagavato santike imam gātham abhāsi
na ayūhatī pāra gataḥ hi sā uva

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho kāmado devaputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam ṭhitaḥ kho kāmadaḥ deva puttaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca
dukkara bhagavā su dukkara bhagavā ati
dullabhā bhagavā yat idam tuṭṭhī iti
dussamādaha bhagavā yat idam cittam iti

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho pañcālacaṇḍo devaputto bhagavato santike imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
analyzed: ekamantam ṭhitaḥ kho pañcālacaṇḍaḥ devaputtaḥ bhagavato santike imam gātham abhāsi

original: Atha kho tāyano devaputto purāṇatitthakaro abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ
analyzed: atha kho tāyanaḥ deva putto purāṇa titthakaraḥ abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkanta vaṇṇo kevala kappa

original: jetavanaṁ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: jetavanam obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam aṭṭhāsi

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho tāyano devaputto bhagavato santike imā gāthāyo abhāsi:
analyzed: ekamantam ṭhitaḥ kho tāyanaḥ deva puttaḥ bhagavato santike imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsi

original: idaṁ vatvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyīti.
analyzed: idam vatvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā tattha iva antaradhāyi iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyāḥ accayena bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “imaṁ, bhikkhave, rattiṁ tāyano nāma devaputto purāṇatitthakaro abhikkantāya rattiyā
analyzed: bhikkhave rattim tāyanaḥ nāma deva putto purāṇa titthakaro abhikkantāya rattiyā

original: abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ jetavanaṁ obhāsetvā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā
analyzed: abhikkanta vaṇṇaḥ kevalakappam jetavanam obhāsetvā yena aham tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho, bhikkhave, tāyano devaputto mama santike imā gāthāyo abhāsi:
analyzed: ekamantam ṭhitaḥ kho bhikkhave tāyanaḥ deva putto mama santike imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsi

original: Idamavoca, bhikkhave, tāyano devaputto, idaṁ vatvā maṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
analyzed: idam avoca bhikkhave tāyanaḥ deva putto idam vatvā mam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā tattha iva antaradhāyi

original: Tena kho pana samayena candimā devaputto rāhunā asurindena gahito hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena candimā deva putto rāhunā asurindena gahitaḥ hoti

original: Atha kho candimā devaputto bhagavantaṁ anussaramāno tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:

original: Atha kho bhagavā candimaṁ devaputtaṁ ārabbha rāhuṁ asurindaṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā candimam deva puttam ārabbha rāhum asur indam gāthāya ajjhabhāsi

original: Atha kho rāhu asurindo candimaṁ devaputtaṁ muñcitvā taramānarūpo yena vepacitti asurindo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā saṁviggo lomahaṭṭhajāto ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: atha kho rāhu asurindaḥ candimam devaputtam muñcitvā taramāna rūpaḥ yena vepacitti asurindaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā sa viggaḥ loma haṭṭha jātaḥ ekamantam aṭṭhāsi

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitaṁ kho rāhuṁ asurindaṁ vepacitti asurindo gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:

kim nu bhītaḥ iva tiṭṭhasi iti

original: Tena kho pana samayena sūriyo devaputto rāhunā asurindena gahito hoti.

original: Atha kho sūriyo devaputto bhagavantaṁ anussaramāno tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:

analyzed: atha kho rāhu asurindaḥ sūriyam devaputtam muñcitvā taramāna rūpaḥ yena vepacitti asurindo tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā sa viggaḥ loma haṭṭha jātaḥ ekamantam aṭṭhāsi

original: Idaṁ vatvā maṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyī”ti.

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Atha kho sivo devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ jetavanaṁ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho sivo devaputto bhagavato santike imā gāthāyo abhāsi:

original: Atha kho bhagavā sivaṁ devaputtaṁ gāthāya paccabhāsi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā sivam devaputtam gāthāya paccabhāsi

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho khemo devaputto bhagavato santike imā gāthāyo abhāsi:
analyzed: ekamantam ṭhitaḥ kho khemaḥ devaputtaḥ bhagavato santike imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsi

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho serī devaputto bhagavantaṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
analyzed: ekamantam ṭhitaḥ kho serī devaputto bhagavantam gāthāya ajjhabhāsi

original: Bhūtapubbāhaṁ, bhante, sirī nāma rājā ahosiṁ dāyako dānapati dānassa vaṇṇavādī.
analyzed: bhūta pubbā āha bhante sirī nāma rājā ahosim dāyakaḥ dānapati dānassa vaṇṇa vādī

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhante, catūsu dvāresu dānaṁ dīyittha samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakānaṁ.
analyzed: tassa bhante catūsu dvāresu dānam dīyittha

original: Atha kho maṁ, bhante, itthāgāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu ma bhante itthāgāram upasaṅkamitvā etat avoca

original: ‘devassa kho dānaṁ dīyati; amhākaṁ dānaṁ na dīyati.
analyzed: devassa kho dānam dīyati amhākam dānam na dīyati

original: Sādhu mayampi devaṁ nissāya dānāni dadeyyāma, puññāni kareyyāmā’ti.
analyzed: sādhu mayam pi devam nissāya dānāni dadeyyāma puññāni kareyyāma ati
aham kho asmi dāyakaḥ dānapati dānassa vaṇṇa vādī
dānam dassāma ati vadante kinti vadeyyanti

original: So khvāhaṁ, bhante, paṭhamaṁ dvāraṁ itthāgārassa adāsiṁ.
analyzed: saḥ khvā āha bhante paṭhamam dvāram itthāgārassa adāsi

original: Tattha itthāgārassa dānaṁ dīyittha; mama dānaṁ paṭikkami.
analyzed: tattha itthāgārassa dānam dīyittha mama dānam paṭikkami

original: Atha kho maṁ, bhante, khattiyā anuyantā upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: atha kho ma bhante khattiyāḥ anuyantaḥ upasaṅkamitvā etat avocuḥ

original: ‘devassa kho dānaṁ dīyati; itthāgārassa dānaṁ dīyati; amhākaṁ dānaṁ na dīyati.
analyzed: devassa kho dānam dīyati itthāgārassa dānam dīyati amhākam dānam na dīyati

original: Sādhu mayampi devaṁ nissāya dānāni dadeyyāma, puññāni kareyyāmā’ti.
analyzed: sādhu mayam pi devam nissāya dānāni dadeyyāma puññāni kareyyāma ati
aham kho asmi dāyakaḥ dānapati dānassa vaṇṇa vādī
dānam dassāma ati vadante kinti vadeyyanti

original: So khvāhaṁ, bhante, dutiyaṁ dvāraṁ khattiyānaṁ anuyantānaṁ adāsiṁ.
analyzed: saḥ khvā aha bhante dutiyam dvāram khattiyānam anuyantānam adāsi

original: Tattha khattiyānaṁ anuyantānaṁ dānaṁ dīyittha, mama dānaṁ paṭikkami.
analyzed: tattha khattiyānam anuyantānam dānam dīyittha mama dānam paṭikkami

original: Atha kho maṁ, bhante, balakāyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu ma bhante balakāyaḥ upasaṅkamitvā etat avoca

original: ‘devassa kho dānaṁ dīyati; itthāgārassa dānaṁ dīyati; khattiyānaṁ anuyantānaṁ dānaṁ dīyati; amhākaṁ dānaṁ na dīyati.
analyzed: devassa kho dānam dīyati itthāgārassa dānam dīyati khattiyānam anuyantānam dānam dīyati amhākam dānam na dīyati

original: Sādhu mayampi devaṁ nissāya dānāni dadeyyāma, puññāni kareyyāmā’ti.
analyzed: sādhu mayam pi devam nissāya dānāni dadeyyāma puññāni kareyyāma ati
aham kho asmi dāyakaḥ dānapati dānassa vaṇṇa vādī
dānam dassāma ati vadante kinti vadeyyanti

original: So khvāhaṁ, bhante, tatiyaṁ dvāraṁ balakāyassa adāsiṁ.
analyzed: saḥ khvā aha bhante tatiyam dvāram balakāyassa adāsi

original: Tattha balakāyassa dānaṁ dīyittha, mama dānaṁ paṭikkami.
analyzed: tattha balakāyassa dānam dīyittha mama dānam paṭikkami

original: Atha kho maṁ, bhante, brāhmaṇagahapatikā upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: atha khalu ma bhante brāhmaṇa gahapatikāḥ upasaṅkamitvā etat avocuḥ

original: ‘devassa kho dānaṁ dīyati; itthāgārassa dānaṁ dīyati; khattiyānaṁ anuyantānaṁ dānaṁ dīyati; balakāyassa dānaṁ dīyati; amhākaṁ dānaṁ na dīyati.
analyzed: devassa kho dānam dīyati itthāgārassa dānam dīyati khattiyānam anuyantānam dānam dīyati balakāyassa dānam dīyati amhākam dānam na dīyati

original: Sādhu mayampi devaṁ nissāya dānāni dadeyyāma, puññāni kareyyāmā’ti.
analyzed: sādhu mayam pi devam nissāya dānāni dadeyyāma puññāni kareyyāma ati
aham kho asmi dāyakaḥ dānapati dānassa vaṇṇa vādī
dānam dassāma ati vadante kinti vadeyyanti

original: So khvāhaṁ, bhante, catutthaṁ dvāraṁ brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṁ adāsiṁ.
analyzed: saḥ khvā aha bhante catuttham dvāram brāhmaṇa gahapatikānam adāsi

original: Tattha brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṁ dānaṁ dīyittha, mama dānaṁ paṭikkami.
analyzed: tattha brāhmaṇa gahapatikānam dānam dīyittha mama dānam paṭikkami

original: Atha kho maṁ, bhante, purisā upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: atha kho ma bhante purisāḥ upasaṅkamitvā etat avocuḥ

original: ‘na kho dāni devassa koci dānaṁ dīyatī’ti.
analyzed: na kho dāni devassa koci dānam dīyati iti

original: Evaṁ vuttāhaṁ, bhante, te purise etadavocaṁ:
analyzed: evam vuttā āha bhante te purise etat avoca

original: ‘tena hi, bhaṇe, yo bāhiresu janapadesu āyo sañjāyati tato upaḍḍhaṁ antepure pavesetha, upaḍḍhaṁ tattheva dānaṁ detha samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakānan’ti.
analyzed: tena hi bhaṇe yaḥ bāhiresu janapadesu āyo sañjāyati tatas upaḍḍham antepure pavesetha upaḍḍham tattha eva dānam detha

original: So khvāhaṁ, bhante, evaṁ dīgharattaṁ katānaṁ puññānaṁ evaṁ dīgharattaṁ katānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pariyantaṁ nādhigacchāmi—
analyzed: saḥ khvā āha bhante evam dīgharattam katānam puññānam evam dīgharattam katānam kusalānam dhammānam pariyantam na adhigacchāmi

original: ettakaṁ puññanti vā ettako puññavipākoti vā ettakaṁ sagge ṭhātabbanti vāti.
analyzed: ettakam puññanti vā ettakaḥ puñña vipāko ti vā ettakam sagge ṭhātabbanti vā ati

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho ghaṭīkāro devaputto bhagavato santike imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
analyzed: ekamantam ṭhitaḥ kho ghaṭīkāraḥ devaputtaḥ bhagavataḥ santike imam gātham abhāsi

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ sambahulā bhikkhū, kosalesu viharanti himavantapasse araññakuṭikāya
analyzed: ekam samayam sambahulāḥ bhikkhū kosalesu viharanti himavanta passe arañña kuṭikāya

original: uddhatā unnaḷā capalā mukharā vikiṇṇavācā muṭṭhassatino asampajānā asamāhitā vibbhantacittā pākatindriyā.
analyzed: uddhatāḥ unnaḷāḥ capalāḥ mukharāḥ vikiṇṇa vācāḥ muṭṭha satinaḥ asampajānāḥ asamāhitāḥ vibbhanta cittā pākatindriyā

original: Atha kho jantu devaputto tadahuposathe pannarase yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi:
analyzed: atha kho jantu deva putto tadahu posathe pannarase yena te bhikkhū tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho rohitasso devaputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam ṭhitaḥ kho rohitassaḥ deva puttaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “yattha nu kho, bhante, na jāyati na jīyati na mīyati na cavati na upapajjati, sakkā nu kho so, bhante, gamanena lokassa anto ñātuṁ vā daṭṭhuṁ vā pāpuṇituṁ vā”ti?
analyzed: yattha nu kho bhante na jāyati na jīyati na mīyati na cavati na upapajjati sakkā nu kho so bhante gamanena lokassa antaḥ ñātum vā daṭṭhum vā pāpuṇitum vā ati

original: “Yattha kho, āvuso, na jāyati na jīyati na mīyati na cavati na upapajjati, nāhaṁ taṁ gamanena lokassa antaṁ ñāteyyaṁ daṭṭheyyaṁ patteyyanti vadāmī”ti.
analyzed: yattha kho āvuso na jāyati na jīyati na mīyati na cavati na upapajjati na aham tam gamanena lokassa antam ñāteyyam daṭṭheyyam patteyyam ti vadāmi iti

original: ‘yattha kho, āvuso, na jāyati na jīyati na mīyati na cavati na upapajjati, nāhaṁ taṁ gamanena lokassa antaṁ ñāteyyaṁ daṭṭheyyaṁ patteyyanti vadāmī’ti.
analyzed: yattha kho āvuso na jāyati na jīyati na mīyati na cavati na upapajjati na aham tam gamanena lokassa antam ñāteyyam daṭṭheyyam patteyyam ti vadāmi iti

original: Bhūtapubbāhaṁ, bhante, rohitasso nāma isi ahosiṁ bhojaputto iddhimā vehāsaṅgamo.
analyzed: bhūta pubbā āha bhante rohitassaḥ nāma isi ahosim bhoja putto iddhimā vehāsaṅgamaḥ

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhante, evarūpo javo ahosi; seyyathāpi nāma daḷhadhammā dhanuggaho
analyzed: tassa bhante evarūpaḥ javaḥ ahosi seyyathā api nāma daḷhadhammā dhanuggahaḥ

original: susikkhito katahattho katayoggo katūpāsano lahukena asanena appakasireneva tiriyaṁ
analyzed: su sikkhitaḥ kata hatthaḥ kata yoggo kata upāsanaḥ lahukena asanena appa kasirena iva

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhante, evarūpo padavītihāro ahosi; seyyathāpi nāma puratthimā samuddā pacchimo samuddo.
analyzed: tassa bhante evarūpaḥ padavī tihāraḥ ahosi seyyathā api nāma puratthimā samuddā pacchimaḥ samuddo

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhante, evarūpaṁ icchāgataṁ uppajji:

analyzed: aham gamanena lokassa antam pāpuṇissāmi iti

original: So khvāhaṁ, bhante, evarūpena javena samannāgato evarūpena ca padavītihārena, aññatreva
analyzed: saḥ khvā āha bhante evarūpena javena samannāgataḥ evarūpena ca padavī tihārena aññatra eva
asita pīta khāyita sāyitā aññatra uccāra passāva kammā aññatra niddā kilamatha paṭivinodanā

original: vassasatāyuko vassasatajīvī vassasataṁ gantvā appatvāva lokassa antaṁ antarāva kālaṅkato.
analyzed: vassa sata āyukaḥ vassa sata jīvī vassa satam gantvā ap patvāva lokassa antam antarāva kālaṅkato

original: ‘yattha kho, āvuso, na jāyati na jīyati na mīyati na cavati na upapajjati, nāhaṁ taṁ gamanena lokassa antaṁ ñāteyyaṁ daṭṭheyyaṁ patteyyanti vadāmī’”ti.
analyzed: yattha kho āvuso na jāyati na jīyati na mīyati na cavati na upapajjati na aham tam gamanena lokassa antam ñāteyyam daṭṭheyyam patteyyam ti vadāmi iti

original: “Na kho panāhaṁ, āvuso, appatvā lokassa antaṁ dukkhassa antakiriyaṁ vadāmi.
analyzed: na kho pana aha āvuso a patvā lokassa antam dukkhassa anta kiriyam vadāmi

original: Api ca khvāhaṁ, āvuso, imasmiṁyeva byāmamatte kaḷevare sasaññimhi samanake lokañca paññapemi lokasamudayañca lokanirodhañca lokanirodhagāminiñca paṭipadanti.
analyzed: api ca khvāha āvuso imasmiya eva byāma matte kaḷevare sa saññimhi samanake lokañca paññapemi loka samudayañca loka nirodhañca loka nirodha gāminiñca paṭipadanti

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho nando devaputto bhagavato santike imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:

analyzed: ekamantam ṭhitaḥ kho nandivisālaḥ devaputtaḥ bhagavantam gāthāya ajjhabhāsi

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:

original: “Kassa hi nāma, bhante, abālassa aduṭṭhassa amūḷhassa avipallatthacittassa āyasmā sāriputto na rucceyya?

original: Kassa hi nāma, bhante, abālassa aduṭṭhassa amūḷhassa avipallatthacittassa āyasmā sāriputto na rucceyyā”ti?

original: Atha kho susimassa devaputtassa devaputtaparisā āyasmato sāriputtassa vaṇṇe bhaññamāne attamanā pamuditā pītisomanassajātā uccāvacā vaṇṇanibhā upadaṁseti.

original: Seyyathāpi nāma maṇi veḷuriyo subho jātimā aṭṭhaṁso suparikammakato paṇḍukambale nikkhitto bhāsate ca tapate ca virocati ca;

original: evamevaṁ susimassa devaputtassa devaputtaparisā āyasmato sāriputtassa vaṇṇe bhaññamāne attamanā pamuditā pītisomanassajātā uccāvacā vaṇṇanibhā upadaṁseti.
analyzed: evam evam susimassa devaputtassa deva putta parisā āyasmataḥ sāriputtassa vaṇṇe bhaññamāne attamanā pamuditā pīti somanassa jātā uccāvacā vaṇṇa nibhā upadaseti

original: Seyyathāpi nāma nikkhaṁ jambonadaṁ dakkhakammāraputtaukkāmukhasukusalasampahaṭṭhaṁ paṇḍukambale nikkhittaṁ bhāsate ca tapate ca virocati ca;

original: evamevaṁ susimassa devaputtassa devaputtaparisā āyasmato sāriputtassa vaṇṇe bhaññamāne attamanā pamuditā pītisomanassajātā uccāvacā vaṇṇanibhā upadaṁseti.
analyzed: evam evam susimassa devaputtassa deva putta parisā āyasmataḥ sāriputtassa vaṇṇe bhaññamāne attamanā pamuditā pīti somanassa jātā uccāvacā vaṇṇa nibhā upadaseti

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho asamo devaputto pūraṇaṁ kassapaṁ ārabbha bhagavato santike imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
analyzed: ekamantam ṭhitaḥ kho asamaḥ deva putto pūraṇam kassapam ārabbha bhagavato santike imam gātham abhāsi

original: Atha kho sahali devaputto makkhaliṁ gosālaṁ ārabbha bhagavato santike imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
analyzed: atha kho sahali deva puttaḥ makkhalim gosālam ārabbha bhagavataḥ santike imam gātham abhāsi

original: Na hi nūna tādisaṁ karoti pāpan”ti.
analyzed: na hi nūna tādisam karoti pāpanti

original: Atha kho nīko devaputto nigaṇṭhaṁ nāṭaputtaṁ ārabbha bhagavato santike imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
analyzed: atha kho nīkaḥ devaputtaḥ nigaṇṭham nāṭa puttam ārabbha bhagavataḥ santike imam gātham abhāsi

original: Atha kho ākoṭako devaputto nānātitthiye ārabbha bhagavato santike imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
analyzed: atha kho ākoṭakaḥ deva puttaḥ nānā titthiye ārabbha bhagavataḥ santike imam gātham abhāsi

original: Na hi nūna te sappurisehi dūre”ti.
analyzed: na hi nūna te sappurisehi dūrā iti

original: Atha kho vegabbhari devaputto ākoṭakaṁ devaputtaṁ gāthāya paccabhāsi:
analyzed: atha kho vegabbhari devaputtaḥ ākoṭakam devaputtam gāthāya paccabhāsi

original: Atha kho māro pāpimā begabbhariṁ devaputtaṁ anvāvisitvā bhagavato santike imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
analyzed: atha kho māraḥ pāpimā begabbharim deva puttam anvāvisitvā bhagavataḥ santike imam gātham abhāsi

original: Atha kho bhagavā “māro ayaṁ pāpimā” iti viditvā, māraṁ pāpimantaṁ gāthāya paccabhāsi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā māraḥ ayam pāpimā iti viditvā māram pāpimantam gāthāya paccabhāsi

original: “Ye keci rūpā idha vā huraṁ vā,
analyzed: ye keci rūpāḥ vā huram vā
sabbe iva te te namuci ppasatthā

original: Atha kho māṇavagāmiyo devaputto bhagavantaṁ ārabbha bhagavato santike imā gāthāyo abhāsi:
analyzed: atha kho māṇavagāmiyaḥ deva puttaḥ bhagavantam ārabbha bhagavataḥ santike imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsi
